channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: iOS 26.2: Apple Abruptly Cancels Key iOS 18.7.3 Update For Millions Of iPhone Users
item.description: If you’ve been waiting for iOS 18.7.3 to reach your iPhone, it looks like it’s been scrapped. Here’s what to know.

item.title: OpenAI vs. Apple? Sam Altman is setting his sights on winning what could be an even higher-stakes AI battle
item.description: Altman recruited iPhone designer Jony Ive to OpenAI this May, and Ive has said the company’s secret device could be ready in the next two years.

item.title: How the ‘Reddit Detective Agency’ and surveillance technology helped find the suspect in the deadly Brown University shooting
item.description: A local Reddit user "blew this case right open” with an old-fashioned tip first posted on the social media platform.

item.title: A photo with Trump in it appears to have been removed from the partial Epstein files the Justice Department released

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
